var/www/docker/cron.dockerfile (dockerfile)
===========================================
Tests: 10 (SUCCESSES: 9, FAILURES: 1, EXCEPTIONS: 0)
Failures: 1 (HIGH: 1)

HIGH: Specify at least 1 USER command in Dockerfile with non-root user as argument
════════════════════════════════════════
Running containers with 'root' user can lead to a container escape situation. It is a best practice to run containers as non-root users, which can be done by adding a 'USER' statement to the Dockerfile.

See https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/ds002
────────────────────────────────────────



var/www/docker/nginx.Dockerfile (dockerfile)
============================================
Tests: 10 (SUCCESSES: 9, FAILURES: 1, EXCEPTIONS: 0)
Failures: 1 (HIGH: 1)

HIGH: Specify at least 1 USER command in Dockerfile with non-root user as argument
════════════════════════════════════════
Running containers with 'root' user can lead to a container escape situation. It is a best practice to run containers as non-root users, which can be done by adding a 'USER' statement to the Dockerfile.

See https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/ds002
────────────────────────────────────────

app/gatewayStubConfigurations/Dockerfile (dockerfile)
=====================================================
Tests: 10 (SUCCESSES: 9, FAILURES: 1, EXCEPTIONS: 0)
Failures: 1 (HIGH: 1)

HIGH: Specify at least 1 USER command in Dockerfile with non-root user as argument
════════════════════════════════════════
Running containers with 'root' user can lead to a container escape situation. It is a best practice to run containers as non-root users, which can be done by adding a 'USER' statement to the Dockerfile.

See https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/ds002
────────────────────────────────────────

root/Dockerfile (dockerfile)
============================
Tests: 10 (SUCCESSES: 9, FAILURES: 1, EXCEPTIONS: 0)
Failures: 1 (HIGH: 1)

HIGH: Specify at least 1 USER command in Dockerfile with non-root user as argument
════════════════════════════════════════
Running containers with 'root' user can lead to a container escape situation. It is a best practice to run containers as non-root users, which can be done by adding a 'USER' statement to the Dockerfile.

See https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/ds002
────────────────────────────────────────

opt/bitnami/rabbitmq/plugins/jose-1.11.1/priv/Dockerfile (dockerfile)
=====================================================================
Tests: 10 (SUCCESSES: 9, FAILURES: 1, EXCEPTIONS: 0)
Failures: 1 (HIGH: 1)

HIGH: Specify at least 1 USER command in Dockerfile with non-root user as argument
════════════════════════════════════════
Running containers with 'root' user can lead to a container escape situation. It is a best practice to run containers as non-root users, which can be done by adding a 'USER' statement to the Dockerfile.

See https://avd.aquasec.com/misconfig/ds002
────────────────────────────────────────
